bari.report.non-canonical-scale: Bone Array Rotation Influence: non-canonical armature scale
bari.report.non-canonical-scale:descript: Inserted fake parent bones have been placed at unexpected position. This may be caused by non-canonical armature scale (like 100). Tweak Offset Distance to more small value if not working properly.
bari.inspector.close-loop:tooltip: Assumes that the first and last elements of Sources are connected
bari.inspector.offset-distance:tooltip: Y-axis distance from original root transform
bari.inspector.influence:tooltip: Global Weight to set in Rotation Constraint
bari.inspector.replace-bones:tooltip: Sets Sources from direct children of this GameObject
bari.inspector.update-influence:tooltip: Sets all influence values of Sources with the slider value on left
